description: Autonomous AI Agents Revolutionizing Compliance with Smart, Adaptive Workflows.

actions.name: getAllApps
actions.description: Retrieves all the applications created by the authenticated user.

actions.name: getTask
actions.description: Retrieves the result of a specific Flipando application task by its task ID.

actions.name: runAppGenerator
actions.description: JSON string of key-value pairs for application input variables.

actions.name: runApp
actions.description: Triggers the execution of a specific Flipando application by ID, initiating a background job for application completion.
